column4: Hello. I need help with ubuntu and accessing my printer, that is connected to a debian pc.
Is there any documentation about the ubuntu printing system?

But how thos the gnomeprinting stuff work. I cannnot access my printer with this tools, and I don't want to do the configuration of cups with emacs. IMHO this is not the appropiate way in ubuntu, there must be a more userfriendly way.
